about_the_game:
No one understands Kristina.
She is about to be expelled from the university for absenteeism, everything is difficult in a relationship with a guy. His parents are divorced and busy figuring things out, to spite them, Kris works part-time in a webcam.

A teen drama turns into a detective story when Kristina's best friend dies under mysterious circumstances. And a mysterious stranger appears in Kris's life, fulfilling her wishes. "Last Wish" is a dark interactive story where you help student Kristina get out of a criminal story, find love and make peace with her family. Or you don't help ― it all depends on your choice.

Unravel a mysterious story whose roots go back to the distant past. Look for clues, read the correspondence of the characters and choose which way the main character will go! Multiple timelines and unexpected plot twists make the game an exciting adventure. Udmurt legends come to life in this story, and to get to the solution, you will have to struggle with difficulties and dispel the curse of the ancient gods.


A variety of game mechanics.
Complete tasks and read the correspondence of the heroes to get more information! The cabinet of thoughts will allow you to immerse yourself in the inner world of Kristina. Mindfulness and reaction mini-games will help you enjoy the game and get involved in what is happening as much as possible.

Modern environment and unusual characters.
The game takes place in a small Russian town. Interact with its residents to help Kristina restore justice! You will find yourself at a country party, get interrogated by the police, meet with real boys and a homeless guy Vasily. You will also have to build relationships with your family, face loneliness and misunderstanding of others.

Every wish can be the last. Make decisions for the main character of the game and influence the course of the story. Unexpected twists and different endings await you. The game makes us think about our responsibility for our fate and what we are willing to give for the fulfillment of our desires.

Features of the game:
- Minimalistic 3D graphics
- Atmospheric author's soundtracks
- Full voice acting in Russian
- Total gameplay time: 2.5 hours
- 1 episode is available in the free version


To be continued...
